Its so fluffy I’m gonna die >.<!!!
No strings attatched, Wedding daze, whats your number = some non obvious but good movies.

item.title: Movies
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:17, topic:446817”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=549700.msg4029731#msg4029731 date=1340647383]

If you like anime, try watching the deadman wonderland series.

Great series.

I agree, didn’t know about it til I watched it on toonami one night - had to watch every episode right then and there.
I really hope they come out with a season 2, I’m pretty sure there’s a season 2 in the manga.
[/quote]
Just watched this, all of it, stops at episode 12, correct?[/quote]
Yup. It’s confirmed there will be a season 2.
